results.title: P E: Lever to learning
results.brief_description: Demonstrates a revolutionary system in which physical activities are used to stimulate both physical fitness ad intellectual interest in the mentally retarded. Uses Equipment such as logs, old tyres, boards, ladders and folding chairs.

results.title: P-N Junction (Episode 3)
results.brief_description: Demonstrates how the creation of single crystals, contains N-Zones and P-Zones leads to the formation of two layer in which the ionic charges are not neutralised. From the Semiconductor physics series, Part 3.

results.title: Oxygen: an introduction to chemistry
results.creator_credit: Jim Callner, Hans Halberstadt and Barr Films
results.brief_description: Explores the nature of oxygen. Shows that oxygen has three forms: solid, liquid and gas, and that when it combines with other atoms it forms new chemical compounds. Illustrates how animals use oxygen to release energy for activity and how plants use carbon dioxide to produce oxygen.

results.title: Overture: Linh from Vietnam
results.creator_credit: Seth Pinsker, Elaine Sperber and Learning Corporation of America
results.brief_description: Docudrama which tells about young Linh Tran and her family, who have settled into their first real home since immigrating to America from Vietnam. Discusses the social hardships they incur, the adjustments they must make to a new culture, and the girl’s friendship with a Mexican-American boy. Cast includes: Pandito Gomez, Kim Ngan Ly, Michael Leon and Stanley Brock
results.creator_credit_for_label: Seth Pinsker, Elaine Sperber and Learning Corporation of America

results.title: Overnight Sensation
results.brief_description: A drama that focuses on a man’s reaction to the unexpected success of his wife’s first novel. The husband, who sees his wife in a traditional role, is compelled to deal with a radically new perspective on their relationship. Departing from the original plot, the film’s ambiguous ending allows viewers to make their own interpretation of the conclusion.

results.title: Overlord
results.creator_credit: Philip Dorte, John Elliot, Air Ministry and BBC-TV
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “War in the Air”.
A series of films telling of the story of air power and its impact on the world during WWII compiled by the BBC and using extracts from war documentary films and sequences constructed and specially shot by BBC Production Unit with the co-ooperation and advice of the services. This episode covers the air plan for the re-entry into north-west Europe.
